import React from'react';import Header from'../../components/header/Header';import ModalEditPost from'../../components/modal/ModalEditPost';import'./Home.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faEdit}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{faTrash}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{handleDeletePost}from'../../services/Home/serviceHandleDeletePost';import{ServiceHomeCreatePost}from'../../services/Home/serviceHomeCreatePost';import{UseHome}from'../../Hooks/UseHome';import{handleEditPost}from'../../functions/FunctionHandleEditPost';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{posts,setPosts,modalEditPostActive,setModalEditPostActive,modalCreatePostActive,setModalCreatePostActive,text,setText,user}=UseHome();// function coming from Hooks/UseHome
const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{ServiceHomeCreatePost(posts,text,setPosts,setModalEditPostActive);}catch(error){console.log(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalEditPost,{active:modalEditPostActive,setActive:setModalEditPostActive,handleSubmit:handleSubmit,text:text,setText:setText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{name:user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.name,active:modalCreatePostActive,setActive:setModalCreatePostActive,setPosts:setPosts}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posts",children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-header-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:post.user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{hidden:true,children:post._id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"edit-btn",onClick:()=>handleEditPost(post._id,posts,user,setModalEditPostActive,setText),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faEdit})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:()=>handleDeletePost(post._id,posts,post,user,setPosts),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faTrash})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.text})})]},post._id))})})]});};export default Home;
